column5: I going to ont. in sept. have always used a birth cert. Do we need a passport this year or a passport card?I have heard both wish they would make up there minds thanks. Going to packwash never been there. Jigs and minnow or spinners which works the best or both. Staying at trout river louge good fishing.
Yes, you will need either a passport or a passport card to enter back into the US from Canada
I would get your application in SOON....it can sometimes take awhile to receive your passport.
I just got mine it took 3 weeks. I was told that it usually takes 4 to 6 weeks.

I got mine in less than 3 weeks when I sent in for the passport card. Crossing the border was a snap both ways. where you going and have a good day. Coming back how many fish where were you and have a good day.
